contentList.content:
Loviatar is the evil goddess of agony and pain and is both queen and servant to the quasi-deity Bane. Her portfolio encompasses suffering and torture holding true to her title as Maiden of Pain and her followers will often engage in self-flagellation while praying for their daily spells.

Domains: Death
Alignment: Lawful Evil

Loviatar is the evil goddess of agony and pain and is both queen and servant to the quasi-deity Bane. Her portfolio encompasses suffering and torture holding true to her title as Maiden of Pain and her followers will often engage in self-flagellation while praying for their daily spells.

Loviatar is the evil goddess of agony and pain and is both queen and servant to the quasi-deity Bane. Her portfolio encompasses suffering and torture holding true to her title as Maiden of Pain and her paladins aim to bring her holy pain and suffering through physical means or psychological torture.
